thread.title: Community college playoffs: Brawl gets E Mississippi barred
thread.title_full: Community college playoffs: Brawl gets E Mississippi barred - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: Community college playoffs: Brawl gets E Mississippi barred
text:
COLUMBUS, Miss. (AP) - A brawl that cleared the East Mississippi Community College bench when it was ahead 48-0 has also barred the school from this year's playoffs for community and junior colleges.
The Commercial Dispatch ( http://bit.ly/1Nuplu7 ) reports that Jim Southward, commissioner of the Mississippi Association of Community and Junior Colleges, confirmed the postseason ban Friday.
He says each player who left the bench area was suspended for two games - and so many players left East Mississippi's bench that it cannot field a playoff team.
Itawamba replaced East Mississippi in the playoffs.
An East Mississippi news release says it's considering an appeal.
Since the game was the season's last for Delta, returning players will sit out next year's first two games, with returning East Mississippi players out of the season opener.
Information from: The Commercial Dispatch, http://www.cdispatch.com
